article_title: Veterans give Tester earful at Helena listening session

og.description: Montana veterans told U.S. Sen. Jon Tester, D-Mont., about their adversarial relationships with Veterans Affairs, the VA’s mismanagement of their medical claims and other VA issues during a listening session
og.title: Veterans give Tester earful at Helena listening session
